javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps
Class JIPBmpBit

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.base.JIPImage
      javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps.JIPImgBitmap
          javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps.JIPBmpBit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JIPBmpBit
extends JIPImgBitmap

Class to manage BIT type images. The data is boolean [0..1] When using the Double methods, a 0 or 1 value will be returned. When using the getPixel method, a boolean value

See Also:
